comment: a social-democratic political party on the Faroe Islands
This is basically the upper KRF party since it was founded id 1970 as as the Christian People's Party (Kristeligt Folkeparti)
This is is a political party in Greenland in the social democratic tradition. Party members have been elected to both the parliament of Greenland and the parliament of Denmark.
A conservative-liberal, agrarian political party on the Faroe Islands
a left-wing political party on the Faroe Islands committed to Faroese independence
